Translations.Text: Fir’auni	avuga	abwira	abakuru	bamukikuje	ati :-	mu	vy’ukuri	uyu n’umurozi afise ubumenyi buhanitse
Agomba	abakure	mugihugu	canyu	akoresheje	uburozi	bwiwe,	none mwebwe mubivuga ko iki
Nabo	bavuga	bati:-	nimumuhe	umwanya	hamwe	na	mwene	wabo hanyuma mubarungike mugisagara caho bakoraniriza abantu bose
Bazokuzanira ibihangange vy’abarozi bose bafise ubumenyi buhanitse
Barakoranijwe	abarozi	bose,	mumwanya	n’umusi	wagenewe	urwo rubanza
Baca babwirwa abantu bati :- none mwese mwamaze gukorana
Nkumbure tuzobakurikira abo barozi niba aribo bazoronka intsinzi
Rero mugihe bashika abo barozi baciye babwira Fir’auni bati:- mbega turaronka impembo nitwa tahukana intsinzi
Fir’auni abishura ati:- egome kandi mwebwe muzoba muri bamwe mu bantu banje bizigirwa
Intumwa y’Imana Mussa (iii) ibabwira babarozi iti:- nimujugunye ivyo mushobora kujugunya
Bajugunya imigozi yabo hamwe n’inkoni zabo nukuvuga bati:- kububasha bwa Fir’auni ni twebwe bene intsinzi
Hanyuma intumwa y’Imana Mussa (iii) ica ijugunya inkoni yayo hasi yankoni ica iramiragura ivyo abo barozi badukanye
Aho niho babarozi bose barwa hasi barapfukama
Baca bavuga bati:- turemeye Umuremyi w’abantu bose
Umuremyi wa Mussa (iii) hamwe na Haruna (iii)

Fir’auni avuga ati:- mbega mwamwemeye uyo Mussa (iii) imbere yuko ndabaha uruhusha? Ntankeka niwe yabaye umukuru wanyu yabigishije uburozi, ubu rero muzotahura neza, ubu ngiye gucagagura amaboko n’amaguru yanyu ndabitandukanije hanyuma nce ndababamba kubiti mwese
Nabo baca bavuga bati:- ntaco bitwaye mu vy’ukuri twese tuzo subira ku Muremyi wacu
Ntankeka twebwe twizeye yuko Umuremyi wacu azotugirira ikigongwe kubera ibicumuro vyacu, kuko twebwe tubaye abambere mukwemera kuba aba Isilamu b’ukuri
Twara	murungikiye	intumwa	y’Imana	Mussa	(iii)	ubutumire	yuko yogenda ku bantu banje mugihe c’ijoro ntankeka muzo kurikiranwa
